mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TBL_EVA.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_EVA (EVA_NUM, ANN_NUM, EVA_NAME, DEGREE, EVA_START_DATE, EVA_END_DATE) VALUES (#{evaNum}, #{annNum}, #{evaName}, #{degree}, #{evaStartDate}, #{evaEndDate})
INSERT INTO TBL_EVA_ITEM (EVA_NUM, EVA_PLOT, EVA_SCORE, EVA_ITEM_NUM) VALUES (#{evaNum}, #{evaPlot}, #{evaScore}, SEQ_TBL_EVA_ITEM.NEXTVAL)
INSERT INTO TBL_RATER_LIST (EVA_NUM, RATER_ID, COMPLETE) VALUES (#{evaNum}, #{raterId}, #{complete})
mapper.select: SELECT EVA_NUM, ANN_NUM, EVA_NAME, DEGREE, EVA_START_DATE, EVA_END_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE FROM TBL_EVA WHERE EVA_NUM = #{evaNum}
SELECT EVA_NUM, EVA_PLOT, EVA_SCORE, EVA_ITEM_NUM FROM TBL_EVA_ITEM WHERE EVA_NUM = #{evaNum}
SELECT EVA_NUM, RATER_ID, COMPLETE FROM TBL_RATER_LIST WHERE EVA_NUM = #{evaNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_RATER_LIST SET COMPLETE = #{complete} WHERE EVA_NUM = #{evaNum} AND RATER_ID = #{raterId}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EVA_NUM, ANN_NUM, EVA_NAME, DEGREE, EVA_START_DATE, EVA_END_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EVA_NUM, ANN_NUM, EVA_NAME, DEGREE, EVA_START_DATE, EVA_END_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE FROM TBL_EVA WHERE EVA_NUM > 0 AND #{keyword} IN (SELECT RATER_ID FROM TBL_RATER_LIST WHERE EVA_NUM = TBL_EVA.EVA_NUM)
ORDER BY EVA_NUM DESC)) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY EVA_NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_EVA WHERE EVA_NUM > 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EVA_NUM, ANN_NUM, EVA_NAME, DEGREE, EVA_START_DATE, EVA_END_DATE, EVA_REG_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_PASS WHERE TBL_PASS.EVA_NUM=inner_eva.EVA_NUM) AS EVA_PASS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EVA.EVA_NUM, EVA.ANN_NUM, EVA.EVA_NAME, EVA.DEGREE, EVA.EVA_START_DATE, EVA.EVA_END_DATE, EVA.EVA_REG_DATE FROM TBL_EVA EVA, TBL_ANN ANN WHERE EVA.EVA_NUM > 0 AND EVA.ANN_NUM = ANN.ANN_NUM AND ANN.MNG_ID = #{keyword}) inner_eva
ORDER BY EVA_NUM DESC) WHERE (RNUM >= #{pageStart} AND RNUM <= #{pageEnd}) ORDER BY EVA_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_RATER_LIST SET COMPLETE = #{complete} WHERE EVA_NUM = #{evaNum} AND RATER_ID = #{raterId}
mapper.select: SELECT EVA_NUM, APP_NUM, RATER_ID, USER_NAME, DETAILS, SCORE, (SUM (SCORE) OVER (PARTITION BY APP_NUM)) AS TOTAL_SUM, ROUND((AVG (SCORE) OVER (PARTITION BY APP_NUM)),3) AS TOTAL_AVG, NVL2(PASS, '1', '0') AS PASS_CHECK FROM( select dt.EVA_NUM, dt.APP_NUM, dt.RATER_ID, USER_NAME, DETAILS, SCORE, pas.APP_NUM as PASS FROM (SELECT dt.EVA_NUM, dt.APP_NUM, dt.RATER_ID, us.USER_NAME, LISTAGG(dt.EVA_DETAIL_SCORE, ',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY dt.EVA_DETAIL_SCORE) AS DETAILS, SUM(dt.EVA_DETAIL_SCORE) AS SCORE FROM TBL_EVA_DETAIL dt, TBL_USER us WHERE (SELECT USER_ID FROM TBL_APP WHERE TBL_APP.APP_NUM = dt.APP_NUM) = us.USER_ID AND EVA_NUM = #{evaNum} GROUP BY dt.EVA_NUM, dt.APP_NUM, dt.RATER_ID, us.USER_NAME ORDER BY dt.APP_NUM) dt left join TBL_PASS pas ON dt.APP_NUM = pas.APP_NUM)
